About me

Hello, I am a 2nd year Aerospace Engineering undergraduate student (Predicted: First) at Queen Mary, University of London. As a self-taught programmer, I have participated in ‘The Complete Web Developer Boot Camp in 2020: Zero to Mastery' (35/35+ hours), where I proactively used HTML5, CSS3 and advanced JavaScript, including NodeJS + ExpressJS, React + Redux, and PostgreSQL to build comprehensive full-stack web applications. I am also completing the 'Java Programming Masterclass' (35/75+ hours) and 'Android App Development Masterclass using Kotlin' (5/50+ hours), whilst self-studying towards the Oracle Certified Professional: Java SE 11 Developer Certification. In addtion, I am also studying Computer Science fundamentals, including Algorithms and Data Structures, to increase my capacity to write scalable code and work professionally as a Software Engineer.

Projects

Data Acquisition Viewer

Telemetry system for Queen Mary Formula Student allowing the team to access twice more data in real-time. Backend logic through Java and the GUI produced using Processing3.

Source Code

Smart Brain

Personal project with the front-end made using React, server-side through NodeJS + ExpressJS and a database for storage of users' information by PostgreSQL. Uses the Clarifai Face Detection API.

Simple application with dynamic search, produced using React + Redux.
